title: Echoes of the Architect
story_summary: In the silent, tightly-controlled city of Stenograd, governance was no longer politics but data - every resident shaped and shadowed by the Behavioral Compliance Index, a system of subtle rewards and quiet punishments. Marek Halden, the architect of this omnipresent machine, died mysteriously, and hidden fractures among the city's ruling Council began to widen. When Sven Halek leaked secret files exposing sabotage and corruption in BCI's origins, outrage swept through the population; demonstrations flared as citizens learned their erasures from society had been calculated acts, not system glitches. As the Council collapsed into infighting and abandonment, neighborhood assemblies rose to fill the void, seizing control of essential services and daring to imagine life beyond algorithmic rule. More revelations followed as Oksana Lintz made Halden's damning correspondences public, igniting demands for justice, restitution for the Vanished, and open debate about whether BCI should be dismantled or preserved as a warning. The city pulsed with memory and hope as residents held vigils, former officials confessed their complicity, and Stenograd - at last - began to decide its own fate, free from the system's shadow.

official.headline: Orderly Assemblies
official.anchor_line: Citizens gather calmly across Stenograd to join neighborhood forums on community direction.
official.contextual_reframing: Community engagement reinforces stability. Public input is valued as the city moves forward together.

official.headline: Council Transitions
official.anchor_line: Several officials step aside while transitional teams coordinate uninterrupted services.
official.contextual_reframing: Change is managed efficiently. The system ensures continual access and uninterrupted support for all residents.

official.headline: Public Review Begins
official.anchor_line: Official records are opened for public review as the city assesses legacy compliance systems.
official.contextual_reframing: Transparency drives renewal. Stenograd remains committed to evidence-based learning and continuous improvement.

underground.headline: Files Exposed
underground.anchor_line: Halden's secret cache is out - proof of tampered BCI scores and mass erasures.
underground.contextual_reframing: No more secrets. The truth breaks through every firewall. Now the Council can't hide behind algorithms.

underground.headline: Council In Hiding
underground.anchor_line: Citizens demand answers. Officials run for cover as crowds spill into the streets.
underground.contextual_reframing: Empty promises and empty offices. This is what accountability looks like in Stenograd - finally, the curtain drops.

underground.headline: Control Unravels
underground.anchor_line: Leaked files confirm system abuses. The people seize the conversation. The city faces its reality together.
underground.contextual_reframing: What was invisible is now undeniable. Stenograd stands at the edge - truth, memory, and change in our hands.
